H0.text: To whom was the actress Carole Lombard married at the time of her death. Robert Montgomery

H1.text: To whom was the actress Carole Lombard married at the time of her death. William Powell

H2.text: To whom was the actress Carole Lombard married at the time of her death. Fredric March

H3.text: To whom was the actress Carole Lombard married at the time of her death. ClarkGable

A4.text: She was interred beside her mother under the name of Carole Lombard Gable.
